name: Lock n' Block
description:
This is my first game, it was made specifically for the  jam "My first Game Jam: winter 2021" . It was made in pygame and is a simple game where you must grab a key in order to open the door to the next level. There are currently only 10 levels, but i would like to update the game and add more mechanics and levels as i gain more experience with coding.

You can find the code for this project here:

CoconutFace/lock-n-block-game: Source code for my lock n' block game (github.com)

If you have any ideas on how i can improve the code, please let me know!
